transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Main Satish bol rahi hu.
Customer: Theek hai. Buy leads ke regarding sir connect kara tha. Aapne call kara tha us din bhi hamare usse customer service se. Fir aapne bola tha mam abhi main bike chala raha hu, driving kar raha hu, abhi main aapko call karta hu, aapne call back nahi kara fir dobara mere ko.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Ab kya hua, main kya tha, thoda raste mein bhi koi milne wala mil gaya fir aur kaam lag gaya mujhe. Fir uske chakkar mein yaad nahi raha. Haan.
Executive: Chaliye bataiye abhi kya buy leads ke related abhi bhi aapko koi problem aa rahi hai sir? Buy lead uske baad aapne Saturday Sunday bhi to consume kari hogi, same hi tha.
Customer: Mam kya batau main, main to yaha na khamakha ka fas gaya. Nahi to ye tha ki yaha se chala na jana hai nahi. Theek hai. Ab itna time do to aadmi dekho. Hai na? Ab jaise mere ko bataya pehle maine yearly package le raha tha, mere se bola gaya TrustSeal mein kara lo sir aapke paas kaam aayega. To maine bola bhai maine chalo ye kehte hai to maine bahut matlab bahut baar mere paas call aaya aur bahut mere se matlab koshish karke fir mere ko matlab package kiya gaya ki bhai tum kara lo kaise bhi karke tumhare paas bhagwan kasam kaam aayega. Aise karke maine chalo ye keh rahe hai.
Executive: Suno. Suno. Haan ji. Haan ji bataiye.
Customer: Maine chalo ye keh rahe hai, ye ye ye ye keh rahe hai ye peeche lage hue hai ki bhai aayega 100% jab ye vaada kar rahe hai to bhai ye de denge kaam. Ab aisa nahi pata tha ki bhai yaha se paisa aise chala jayega.
Executive: Shukriya main aapki profile pe kaam kar rahi thi Saturday bhi. Yaha pe na kuch product hai mere ko isliye nahi hogi aapke product ki.
Customer: Haan mere se aata hai aap dekho.
Executive: Achha ji. Ek dunga photo to main. Baki dekho aisa aata hai lead ab jaise maine consume kiya us time mein batata hu. Ab jaise yaha maine ye kis parivari hai ye consume kiya hai na? Ab ye ye isme upar likha hai Makrana Marble series statue. Hai na? Maine ye consume kiya to wo bola nahi mujhe Sirmuk ka chahiye. Sirmuk kya hota hai?
Customer: Marble ka nahi chahiye, Sirmuk ka chahiye. Nahi nahi bhaiya yaha likha hua hai white Makrana Marble, maine tabhi aapko call kiya hai.
Executive: Haan ji. Bhai isme likha hai aapne Makrana Marble hai, series statue likha hai. Main main to isliye call kiya aapko to wo bola nahi material dusra chahiye mujhe ye koi material marble ka nahi chahiye. Mere ko to kam paise ka aur composite matlab kya bola composite wo kya material wo chahiye.
Executive: Achha. Main isliye wo aapke yaha isliye na main aapki profile pe kaam kar rahi thi. Maine bataya na ki aapko buy leads galat aa rahi hai isliye main aap hi ki profile pe kaam karungi magar yaha pe na total 100 aise 125 aise product honge jisme aap mere ko photo bhi chahiye hogi aapki.
Customer: Suno suno suno suno suno. Aur suno ji ye main Ahmedabad ka hai usko bhejta hu main kaha ki ye jo suit ka suit ya sabhi suit ka matlab shop hai khud ka. To wo main batata hu aapko. Kitna tarikh ka tha wo meri baat hui thi wo itna mere ko dhamka raha tha ek tarikh se.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kidhar gaya date samuh kaha hai? Kal parso ka hi tha wo shayad. Haan mil gaya ye raha. 4 feet ye raha 4 feet Kali Maa ki murti black marble Kali Maa statue 4 feet.
Executive: Haan ji. Ahmedabad ka hai ye Gujarat ka. Ab ye batao is lead mein to koi fark nahi hai na ye to bilkul saaf hai bilkul shuddh hai. Isme likha hua hai black Kali statue. Hmm. Ab main kya ye to marble ki hai asli khasi deal hai IndiaMART ki main baat karta hu kya kehta hai bhai yaar. To maine usse baat ki to wo to kehne laga main to jaanta hu sabko udhar Ramgarh Rajasthan mein jaanta hu Badodre mein Badode mein jaanta hu aur Gola ka bas mein jaanta hu Jaipur mein bhi jaanta hu ye sab. Sir main na ek kaam karti hu aap thoda suniye aapko jaise ye buy leads vagera nahi aa rahi na isliye main aapki profile pe kaam kar rahi thi. Aap ya to ek baar Google Meet pe aa jao jo jo photo mere ko chahiye.
Customer: Suno suno suno. Aap to suno. Maine usse bola na jab. Hmm. Meri baat to suno aap puri. Maine bola bhai baat suno isme kya isme kya hai jaante ho to bhai jaante ho to bhai aap lead kyu daal rahe ho unse mangwa lete aap jinko jaante ho. Haan ji haan haan. Haan haan. Fir kya samjhna aapne to wo bola jyada samjhdaar ban raha hai jyada pagal vagal hai kya koi sharab pi rakhi hai. Maine isme kya galat bola bhai aapke. Hmm. Ji maine koi galat nahi bola. Fir usne call kaat diya. Fir call kaat diya fir usne mera number delete list kar diya daal diya. Maine dobara call lagaya to bata raha hai ki vyast sunaai de raha hai number mera. Ab batao kya kare aadmi?
Executive: Koi nahi sir main aap hi ki. Haan chalo main aapki profile pe sir isliye main kaam kar rahi thi aapka catalog bhi open kara. Isme magar aap na ek baar IndiaMART ki profile apni open karenge ek baar.
Customer: Haan aap kar lijiye. Sir product pe jaiye.
Executive: Product pe jata hu. Product pe yaha pe low isko 125 product honge dikh raha hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: In 125 product ki mere ko photo share karo aap WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Theek hai ji. Aur yaha pe jo bhi details hogi wo main add kar dungi aur ek aur cheez sir aapne jaise us din customer care pe call kara tha to ek concern raise tha. Main apne end se use close kar deti hu fir.
Customer: Theek hai. Ab kya karoge aapke. Suno aap aapko na bahut Deepika ji aap aaye na Deepika ji baat nahi nahi nahi nahi sir aapki aapki main profile pe na kaam kar rahi hu abhi aap pehle mere ko photo share karo theek hai aur jo bhi usme cheeze reh rahi hai wo main apni taraf se khud add kar rahi hu baki ye jo concern.
Executive: Kaun se number pe bhejna hai usi wale pe?
Customer: Haan haan nahi nahi jo mera number aapke paas save hai na WhatsApp pe usi number pe aapko bhejna hai. Theek hai aur ab Deepika ke naam se. Haan haan jo Deepika naam se usi pe bhejna hai aapko aur yaha pe na aapne customer care pe call kara tha agar aage se kuch bhi doubt ho aap mere ko hi call karo main to hamesha uthati hu us time meeting mein thi isliye call answer nahi ho paya tha baki main kaam karti hu. Koi baat nahi. Uthane ki koi baat nahi. Samajh samajh gayi sir main samajh gayi buy leads se aapko problem aa rahi hai. Batao wo wo kyu kiya maine jab wo mere se nonsense bolne laga tab maine wo hold jaise lete hai na hold par. Haan haan. Chalo main call call call conference karta hu hold pe leke IndiaMART wale ko aur main baat karata hu aapki koi main thank you road jo mere se asabhyata se baat kar rahe ho aap sab maine call kiya uske liye. Achha. Nahi nahi aage se aise ho aap mere ko le sakte ho call pe koi problem nahi hai main call aapki zarur answer karungi but main abhi ye keh rahi thi aapki jo. Haan. Ab main kya batau usne jis jis type se mujhe matlab bola mere se wo main aapko bata bhi nahi sakta itna badda bola tab maine main ruko ek minute main abhi call kar leta hu Deepika ji ko fir aapko call laga fir aapka jab utha nahi paye to maine waha 96 wale pe main ruko abhi main call laga deta hu sir. Jab mere ko pata chalega. Haan main koi aadmi hu jo se baat kar rahe. Achha achha. Koi nahi sir. Koi nahi koi nahi aap na next time se mere hi number pe call karna main ye puch rahi thi na main isse concern. Sabse upar add hai ye Dhule Lal ji. Hai na? Iska maine photo dal diya hai. Agla main Balaknath ji ka dal deta hu Balaknath hai aa jayega. Uske main dal deta hu photo. Aap mere ko share kar do uska na size 1000 by 1000 hona chahiye yaha pe size kam hai aapki photos ka. To mere ko aap photo share kar do thodi bade size mein baki main add kar dungi uska koi problem nahi hai aur sir ek aur cheez ki ye jo concern raise hai fir main ye close kar du na apne side se aapke paas ek mail aayega feedback mail usme sir positive response kariyega. Theek hai ji. Theek hai ji. Response ka main positive.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting relevant buyleads.

- Customer received threatening call from another user.

- Wants refund as he is not getting business.



Resolution:

- Executive is working on customer's profile.

- Executive asked to share product photos on WhatsApp.

- Executive will close the raised concern.

- Executive assured customer to call her for doubts.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share product photos on WhatsApp.

- Customer will give positive feedback on mail.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, profile, refund, photos, catalog
